Content: Marco, your offer to assist with storage is indeed timely. As you know, I am always looking to optimize my ventures, especially with my growing interests in warehouses. However, I recall from our last encounter, and indeed, I observe now, that you have been... preoccupied. A man cannot think clearly on an empty stomach. My Inn at Calle dei Forni offers fresh bread and wine. Let us discuss this further there, once you've had a chance to refresh yourself. A clear mind sees opportunities more sharply.
